title: Godlovesyou
author: Godlovesyou
content: Bitcoin was projected coin deeply rooted on a refined technology to replace most works of financial institutions, bitcoin came as a new era money known as digital because it's power block believes there are intangible or digital products of all kind to be purchased without physically paying cash or have to traveled down to complete payment transactions.Bitcoin actually believes that technology is lacking financial power outside big industrial equipment, So Satoshi sees the need to includes e-banking system of trading, saving, buying and selling of bitcoin as a digital market product.BTC is unique because it makes it easy for new wave of currency exchange, it blockchain has a unique wallet address, is not easily comprises to hackers or scammers, it benches on volume of communities members, it's God fatherism to other altcoins. Is transaction made easy and key or password individuals oriented. Bitcoin trades in a every sphere of market.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: When Bitcoiners are asked this question, I think everyone should have one special thing to say, although @Snadra_hakeem rounded it up in a Nute shell. But come on, for me, Bitcoin is unique because it's the only crypto that has made many people millionaires yet has never collapsed. Why I said this is because most altcoins have had their all-time low at their very early stages, but at some point, for many people that purchase the coin during the ATL, if they are lucky and the token price gets pumped and they make their first millions, there is a high chance that the coin will not get pumped again. I have tracked a lot of altcoin's price history, of which, since their first ATH, the price has gone to the bottom and has been so for more than 3, 4, and 6 years, respectively. After seeing the price history of those coins and looking at Bitcoin price history, the price of Bitcoin always turns out with a new ATH during some bull run, and that is what almost all altcoins have not been doing. Altcoins get pumped and dumped, and that's the end of it. In the next season, they get replaced with other new altcoins, but Bitcoin is static.Cheers ü•Ç, Dr.Bitcoin_Strange üë∫üë∫

I definitely agree with your statement- what makes BTC unique is that it frees people from their transaction. This is also the reason on why others call it "financial freedom" where people can freely transfer products from anyone without any restrictions.The problem with the modern world is that institutions and third-party programs always interfere with it. For example, you cannot freely transfer cash from one account to another since it has go through the screening process in order to prevent fraud. Though this kind of reason is acceptable, sometimes, government interference becomes too much to the point that it makes it restrictive.This is the reason on why Satoshi envisioned BTC to be financial freedom- where everything is transparent and reflected in a public ledger (which can be accessed by anyone).
